snippet: Bjoergen remained on course for her first Tour de Ski victory as she won her fifth straight stage in Toblach, Italy.
abstract: Marit Bjoergen wins Tour de Ski in Toblach, Italy.
lead_paragraph: Bjoergen remained on course for her first Tour de Ski victory as she won her fifth straight stage in Toblach, Italy.

headline.main: Marit Bjoergen Wins Fifth Straight Stage
